name: FNAF - REVENGEANCE
description:
• More then 12 animatronic!
  • Skins!
  • Bosses!
  • Chips & Bytes!
  • Open World
  • Challenges

Collect the Animatronics/Skins, Defeat the Bosses or find they in Open World

Fight with Animatronic Bosses, every Boss has his own unique attacks and environment.

Explore the world, Talks & Trade with characters.

Code: Drayn

Artwork: Drayn, Genos, Askywalker, Toby Fox

Music: Tommy Lapointe Blondin, Leon Riskin, Allien Simpson

Testing: Genos
